documentation.text: @dev Claim QT token reward (once per day)

@dev Deposit QT tokens to the contract (owner only)
 @param amount Amount of QT tokens to deposit

@dev Withdraw QT tokens from the contract (owner only)
 @param amount Amount of QT tokens to withdraw

@dev Get contract's QT token balance
 @return balance Current QT token balance

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New owner is the zero address"

arguments.value: New owner is the zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New owner is the zero address"

documentation.text:
@dev Transfer ownership of the contract
 @param newOwner Address of the new owner
